Title: Verify The system displays the correct title and buttons on the Institution Management page

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page link in the navigation menu
Step Expected: Institution Management page loads with title 'Institution Management' on the top left

Step Action: Verify the title on the top left of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: Title 'Institution Management' is displayed in the correct font size and color

Step Action: Check the top right corner of the Institution Management page for buttons
Step Expected: Two buttons are visible: a 'Refresh' button (icon) and a blue '+ Add Institution' button

Step Action: Hover over the 'Refresh' button (icon) on the top right corner of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: Tooltip or button text 'Refresh' is displayed

Step Action: Click on the blue '+ Add Institution' button on the top right corner of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: New institution form or modal window opens to add a new institution

Step Action: Verify the column headers on the Institution Management page
Step Expected: Correct column headers are displayed, including institution name, location, and other relevant details

Title: Verify The system displays the correct columns in the table header

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management tab on the navigation menu
Step Expected: The Institution Management page loads with the title 'Institution Management' on the top left

Step Action: Verify the table header on the Institution Management page
Step Expected: The table header displays the correct columns, including 'Institution Name', 'Address', 'City', 'State', and 'Country'

Step Action: Hover over each column header to verify tooltips or sorting functionality
Step Expected: Tooltips or sorting icons are displayed for each column header, providing additional information or functionality

Step Action: Click on the 'Institution Name' column header to sort the table by institution name
Step Expected: The table is sorted in ascending order by institution name, with the correct sorting icon displayed in the column header

Step Action: Verify the 'Refresh' button and '+ Add Institution' button are present and enabled on the top right of the page
Step Expected: The 'Refresh' button and '+ Add Institution' button are visible, enabled, and display the correct icons and text

Title: Verify The system displays a colored badge in the 'Status' column for active institutions

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page link in the navigation menu
Step Expected: Institution Management page loads with title 'Institution Management' on the top left

Step Action: Verify the 'Status' column exists in the institutions table
Step Expected: The 'Status' column is visible and has a header label 'Status'

Step Action: Check the status of an active institution in the 'Status' column
Step Expected: A colored badge is displayed in the 'Status' column for the active institution, indicating its active status

Step Action: Hover over the colored badge in the 'Status' column for the active institution
Step Expected: A tooltip with the text 'Active' appears, providing additional information about the institution's status

Step Action: Verify the color of the badge for an active institution
Step Expected: The badge is green, indicating the institution is active

Title: Verify The system displays an icon next to the text in the 'Type' column

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management tab
Step Expected: The Institution Management page loads with the title 'Institution Management' on the top left

Step Action: Verify the 'Type' column is present in the table
Step Expected: The 'Type' column is visible with a header label 'Type'

Step Action: Check each row in the 'Type' column for an icon
Step Expected: An icon is displayed next to the text in each cell of the 'Type' column

Step Action: Hover over the icon in the 'Type' column
Step Expected: A tooltip or description of the icon is displayed, providing context for the icon

Step Action: Verify the icon is consistent across all rows in the 'Type' column
Step Expected: The same icon is displayed next to the text in each cell of the 'Type' column, indicating consistency in icon usage

Title: Verify The system reloads the table data when the 'Refresh' button is clicked

Step Action: Click the 'Refresh' button (icon) on the top right of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: The table data starts reloading, and a loading indicator is displayed

Step Action: Wait for 2-3 seconds to allow the table data to reload
Step Expected: The loading indicator disappears, and the table data is updated

Step Action: Verify the table columns and data are correctly displayed after the refresh
Step Expected: All table columns are visible, and the data is correctly sorted and filtered according to the current settings

Step Action: Compare the reloaded table data with the data before the refresh
Step Expected: The reloaded table data is updated and reflects any changes made since the last refresh

Step Action: Click on a specific institution row in the reloaded table
Step Expected: The institution details are displayed, and the data matches the reloaded table data

Title: Verify The system opens the 'Edit Institution' modal when the 'Edit' button is clicked

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page link in the navigation menu
Step Expected: Institution Management page loads with title 'Institution Management' on the top left

Step Action: Locate the 'Edit' button corresponding to an institution in the list and click on it
Step Expected: 'Edit Institution' modal window opens with institution details pre-populated

Step Action: Verify the 'Edit Institution' modal window has the correct institution details and editable fields
Step Expected: Institution details are correctly displayed and fields are editable

Step Action: Click on the institution name in the institution list to ensure the correct institution is being edited
Step Expected: Correct institution details are displayed in the 'Edit Institution' modal window

Step Action: Verify the 'Edit Institution' modal window has a 'Save' or 'Update' button
Step Expected: 'Save' or 'Update' button is visible and enabled

Title: Verify The system closes the modal when the 'X' icon or 'Cancel' button is clicked

Step Action: Click on the blue '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: A modal window opens with the title 'Add Institution' and contains the 'X' icon and 'Cancel' button

Step Action: Click the 'X' icon in the top right corner of the 'Add Institution' modal window
Step Expected: The modal window closes and the Institution Management page is displayed

Step Action: Click on the blue '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page again
Step Expected: The 'Add Institution' modal window opens again with the 'X' icon and 'Cancel' button

Step Action: Click the 'Cancel' button in the 'Add Institution' modal window
Step Expected: The modal window closes and the Institution Management page is displayed

Step Action: Verify the Institution Management page is fully accessible after the modal window is closed
Step Expected: All elements on the Institution Management page are accessible and functional

Title: Verify The system allows editing of institution fields and updates the institution successfully

Step Action: Click on the 'Edit' button for an existing institution on the Institution Management page
Step Expected: Institution fields become editable, with fields such as 'Institution Name', 'Address', and 'Phone Number' available for modification

Step Action: Modify the 'Institution Name' field by entering a new name, 'Test Institution'
Step Expected: The new institution name 'Test Institution' is displayed in the field, with no validation errors

Step Action: Click the 'Save' button to update the institution
Step Expected: A success message 'Institution updated successfully' is displayed, and the institution fields are updated with the new information

Step Action: Click the 'Refresh' button to reload the institution list
Step Expected: The institution list is updated, with the modified institution name 'Test Institution' reflected in the list

Step Action: Verify the updated institution details by clicking on the 'View' button for the modified institution
Step Expected: The institution details page displays the updated information, including the new institution name 'Test Institution'

Step Action: Click the 'Back' button to return to the Institution Management page
Step Expected: The Institution Management page is displayed, with the updated institution list and no errors

Title: Verify The system displays a success notification after updating an institution

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page link in the navigation menu
Step Expected: Institution Management page loads with title 'Institution Management' on the top left

Step Action: Click on the 'Edit' button next to an existing institution
Step Expected: Edit Institution form displays with fields populated with current institution data

Step Action: Update the institution name to 'New Institution Name' and click the 'Save' button
Step Expected: Success notification 'Institution updated successfully' displays at the top of the page

Step Action: Verify the institution list updates to reflect the new institution name 'New Institution Name'
Step Expected: Institution list displays the updated institution name 'New Institution Name'

Step Action: Click on the 'Refresh' button (icon) on the top right
Step Expected: Institution list refreshes and still displays the updated institution name 'New Institution Name'

Title: Verify The system prompts for confirmation before deleting an institution

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page link in the navigation menu
Step Expected: Institution Management page loads with title 'Institution Management' on the top left

Step Action: Click on the checkbox next to an existing institution to select it
Step Expected: The checkbox is checked and the 'Delete' button becomes enabled

Step Action: Click on the 'Delete' button
Step Expected: A confirmation dialog box appears with a message 'Are you sure you want to delete this institution?' and 'Yes' and 'No' buttons

Step Action: Click on the 'Yes' button in the confirmation dialog box
Step Expected: The institution is deleted and a success message 'Institution deleted successfully' is displayed

Step Action: Verify the deleted institution is no longer listed on the Institution Management page
Step Expected: The deleted institution is not visible in the list and the page displays the updated list of institutions

Title: Verify The system handles invalid input for institution fields

Step Action: Click on the '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: A new institution form appears with required fields such as Institution Name, Address, and Country

Step Action: Enter a string of 1000 characters in the Institution Name field
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Institution Name must be between 1 and 50 characters' appears below the field

Step Action: Leave the Address field blank and click on the 'Save' button
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Address is required' appears below the field

Step Action: Select a country from the Country dropdown and then select a non-existent option by typing 'Invalid Country' in the dropdown search
Step Expected: The dropdown does not accept the invalid input and displays a 'No results found' message

Step Action: Enter a string in the Institution Code field that exceeds the maximum allowed length of 10 characters
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Institution Code must be between 1 and 10 characters' appears below the field

Step Action: Click on the 'Save' button without filling in any of the required fields
Step Expected: Multiple validation error messages appear for each required field, such as 'Institution Name is required', 'Address is required', and 'Country is required'

Title: Verify The system displays an error message when trying to update an institution with invalid data

Step Action: Click on the '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: A new institution form displays with empty fields for institution name, address, and other details

Step Action: Enter an institution name with more than 50 characters in the 'Institution Name' field
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Institution name should be 50 characters or less' appears below the field

Step Action: Enter a non-unique institution name that already exists in the system in the 'Institution Name' field
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Institution name already exists' appears below the field

Step Action: Click on the 'Save' button without filling in any required fields
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Please fill in all required fields' appears at the top of the form

Step Action: Enter an invalid email address 'invalidemail' in the 'Institution Email' field
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Please enter a valid email address' appears below the field

Title: Verify The system prevents deletion of an institution without confirmation

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page and select an institution from the list
Step Expected: The institution details are displayed, and a 'Delete' button is visible

Step Action: Click the 'Delete' button without confirming the deletion
Step Expected: A confirmation dialog box appears with a message 'Are you sure you want to delete this institution?' and options to confirm or cancel

Step Action: Click the 'Cancel' button in the confirmation dialog box
Step Expected: The confirmation dialog box closes, and the institution is not deleted

Step Action: Click the 'Delete' button and then click the 'Confirm' button in the confirmation dialog box without checking the 'Confirm deletion' checkbox
Step Expected: A validation error message is displayed, 'Please confirm deletion to proceed'

Step Action: Click the 'Delete' button, check the 'Confirm deletion' checkbox, and then click the 'Confirm' button in the confirmation dialog box
Step Expected: The institution is deleted, and a success message 'Institution deleted successfully' is displayed

Title: Verify The system handles concurrent updates to an institution

Step Action: Click the '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page and enter institution details 'Institution Name: Test Institution, Institution Code: TI001' and click Save
Step Expected: A success message 'Institution added successfully' is displayed and the institution is listed on the page

Step Action: Simultaneously from another user session, attempt to update the same institution 'TI001' with new details 'Institution Name: Updated Test Institution, Institution Code: TI001'
Step Expected: An error message 'Institution is being updated by another user, please try again later' is displayed and the update is not saved

Step Action: From the first user session, click the Refresh button and verify the institution details
Step Expected: The institution details remain unchanged, showing the original values 'Institution Name: Test Institution, Institution Code: TI001'

Step Action: Attempt to update the institution 'TI001' from the first user session with new details 'Institution Name: Updated Test Institution, Institution Code: TI002'
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Institution code already exists' is displayed and the update is not saved

Step Action: Click the Cancel button to discard changes and verify the institution details
Step Expected: The institution details remain unchanged, showing the original values 'Institution Name: Test Institution, Institution Code: TI001'

Step Action: Attempt to delete the institution 'TI001' while another user session is still active
Step Expected: An error message 'Institution is being accessed by another user, deletion failed' is displayed and the institution is not deleted

Title: Verify The system displays an error message when trying to delete an institution that is being edited

Step Action: Click on an institution in the list to start editing it
Step Expected: The institution's details are displayed in edit mode, with editable fields and a 'Save' button

Step Action: Click the 'Delete' button while the institution is still in edit mode
Step Expected: An error message 'Cannot delete institution while it is being edited' is displayed on the screen

Step Action: Verify the error message is displayed below the institution's details
Step Expected: The error message is visible below the institution's details, with a red color and a warning icon

Step Action: Click the 'Save' button to save the institution's changes
Step Expected: The institution's changes are saved, and the error message is removed from the screen

Step Action: Click the 'Delete' button again after saving the institution's changes
Step Expected: A confirmation dialog is displayed to confirm the deletion of the institution

Title: Verify The system prevents update of an institution with a duplicate name

Step Action: Click on the '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: A new institution form displays with 'Institution Name' field, 'Description' field, and 'Save' button

Step Action: Enter an existing institution name 'Existing Institution' in the 'Institution Name' field
Step Expected: A validation error message 'Institution with this name already exists' appears below the 'Institution Name' field

Step Action: Click on the 'Save' button to attempt to save the new institution
Step Expected: The 'Save' button is disabled or a popup error message 'Institution with this name already exists' is displayed, preventing the update

Step Action: Verify the error message by checking the institution list
Step Expected: The institution list still displays the original institutions, without the duplicate institution

Step Action: Enter a unique institution name 'New Institution' in the 'Institution Name' field
Step Expected: The validation error message 'Institution with this name already exists' disappears, and the 'Save' button is enabled

Step Action: Click on the 'Save' button to save the new institution with the unique name
Step Expected: The new institution 'New Institution' is successfully added to the institution list

Title: Verify The system handles update of an institution with an invalid status

Step Action: Click on the 'Edit' button for an existing institution
Step Expected: Institution edit form is displayed with fields for name, description, and status

Step Action: Select an invalid status from the status dropdown list (e.g. a status that is not 'Active', 'Inactive', or 'Pending')
Step Expected: Validation error message is displayed next to the status field, e.g. 'Invalid status selected'

Step Action: Click the 'Save' button to submit the institution update form with the invalid status
Step Expected: Form submission fails, and an error message is displayed at the top of the page, e.g. 'Failed to update institution: Invalid status'

Step Action: Verify the institution's status has not been updated in the institution list
Step Expected: Institution's status remains the same as before the update attempt

Step Action: Enter valid institution data, including a valid status, and click the 'Save' button
Step Expected: Institution is updated successfully, and a success message is displayed, e.g. 'Institution updated successfully'

Step Action: Verify the institution's status has been updated correctly in the institution list
Step Expected: Institution's status is updated to the newly selected valid status

Title: Verify The system handles update of an institution with an invalid location

Step Action: Click on the '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: A new institution form is displayed with fields for institution name, location, and other details

Step Action: Enter a valid institution name and an invalid location (e.g. '@#$') in the respective fields
Step Expected: A validation error message is displayed below the location field, indicating that the location is invalid

Step Action: Click on the 'Update' button to submit the form with the invalid location
Step Expected: The form submission fails, and the validation error message remains displayed below the location field

Step Action: Verify that the institution is not updated in the institution list by checking the institution name and location
Step Expected: The institution list remains unchanged, and the new institution with the invalid location is not added

Step Action: Enter a valid location (e.g. 'New York') in the location field and click on the 'Update' button
Step Expected: The form submission is successful, and the institution is updated with the new valid location

Step Action: Verify that the error message is no longer displayed after entering a valid location
Step Expected: The validation error message is removed, and the form is in a valid state

Title: Verify The system handles institutions with a large number of characters in the 'Name' field

Step Action: Enter 256 characters in the 'Name' field of the institution form, including a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters
Step Expected: The system accepts the input without truncating or throwing an error

Step Action: Enter 257 characters in the 'Name' field of the institution form
Step Expected: The system prevents the input, displaying a validation error message 'Name cannot exceed 256 characters'

Step Action: Enter a single character in the 'Name' field of the institution form
Step Expected: The system accepts the input, allowing the institution to be saved with a single-character name

Step Action: Leave the 'Name' field blank and click the 'Add Institution' button
Step Expected: The system displays a validation error message 'Name is required' and prevents the institution from being saved

Step Action: Enter 256 characters of repeated text (e.g. 'a') in the 'Name' field of the institution form
Step Expected: The system accepts the input without truncating or throwing an error, and the institution can be saved with the repeated name

Title: Verify The system handles institutions with a small number of characters in the 'Name' field

Step Action: Enter 'a' in the 'Name' field of the institution form and click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: Validation error is displayed with message 'Institution name must be at least 2 characters'

Step Action: Enter 'ab' in the 'Name' field of the institution form and click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: Institution is added successfully and listed in the institutions table

Step Action: Enter a string of 1 character in the 'Name' field of the institution form and click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: Validation error is displayed with message 'Institution name must be at least 2 characters'

Step Action: Enter a string of 2 characters in the 'Name' field of the institution form and click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: Institution is added successfully and listed in the institutions table

Step Action: Enter a string of 255 characters in the 'Name' field of the institution form and click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: Institution is added successfully and listed in the institutions table

Step Action: Enter a string of 256 characters in the 'Name' field of the institution form and click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: Validation error is displayed with message 'Institution name must be no more than 255 characters'

Title: Verify The system handles institutions with a large number of characters in the 'Location' field

Step Action: Enter 255 characters in the 'Location' field of the 'Add Institution' form
Step Expected: The system accepts the input without truncation or error message

Step Action: Enter 256 characters in the 'Location' field of the 'Add Institution' form
Step Expected: The system displays a validation error message 'Location exceeds maximum allowed characters'

Step Action: Enter a string with 1000 characters in the 'Location' field of the 'Add Institution' form
Step Expected: The system displays a validation error message 'Location exceeds maximum allowed characters' and prevents form submission

Step Action: Enter a string with special characters (!, @, #, $) in the 'Location' field of the 'Add Institution' form
Step Expected: The system accepts the input without error or truncation

Step Action: Enter a string with non-ASCII characters (é, ü, ó) in the 'Location' field of the 'Add Institution' form
Step Expected: The system accepts the input without error or truncation

Step Action: Save the institution with a 'Location' field containing 255 characters and verify the data is persisted correctly
Step Expected: The institution is saved successfully and the 'Location' field retains all 255 characters

Title: Verify The system handles institutions with a small number of characters in the 'Location' field

Step Action: Enter 'A' in the 'Location' field of the institution form
Step Expected: The system accepts the input and displays no validation error message

Step Action: Enter a string of 2 characters 'AB' in the 'Location' field of the institution form
Step Expected: The system accepts the input and displays no validation error message

Step Action: Enter a string of 1 character 'A' and then click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: The system either accepts the input or displays a validation error message requiring a minimum length for the 'Location' field

Step Action: Enter a string of 255 characters in the 'Location' field of the institution form and then click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: The system accepts the input or displays a validation error message if the length exceeds the maximum allowed

Step Action: Enter an empty string in the 'Location' field of the institution form and then click the '+ Add Institution' button
Step Expected: The system displays a validation error message requiring a value for the 'Location' field

Title: Verify The system handles institutions with a large number of contacts

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page and then click the '+ Add Institution' button to add 1000 institutions with 1000 contacts each
Step Expected: The system accepts the institutions and displays them on the page without any errors or performance issues

Step Action: Scroll to the bottom of the institution list and click the 'Refresh' button
Step Expected: The institution list is refreshed and all 1000 institutions are still displayed on the page

Step Action: Click on an institution with 1000 contacts and then click on the 'Contacts' tab
Step Expected: The contacts tab displays all 1000 contacts for the selected institution without any pagination issues or data truncation

Step Action: Attempt to add 1001 contacts to an institution
Step Expected: The system prevents the addition of the 1001st contact and displays an error message indicating the maximum number of contacts has been reached

Step Action: Search for an institution by name in the search bar and select it from the search results
Step Expected: The system displays the selected institution with all its contacts, and the search results are updated to reflect the selection

Step Action: Click on the 'Export' button to export the list of institutions with 1000 contacts each to a CSV file
Step Expected: The system exports the institution list to a CSV file without any data loss or corruption, and the file can be opened and viewed successfully

Title: Verify The system handles institutions with no contacts

Step Action: Click on the Institution Management page tab and verify the title 'Institution Management' is displayed on the top left
Step Expected: The title 'Institution Management' is displayed on the top left of the page

Step Action: Click on the 'Refresh' button (icon) on the top right of the Institution Management page
Step Expected: The institution list is refreshed and updated

Step Action: Click on the blue '+ Add Institution' button on the top right of the Institution Management page and enter an institution name without any contacts
Step Expected: The system allows the institution to be added without any contacts and displays a success message

Step Action: Verify the institution with no contacts is listed in the institution table with a clear indication of 'No Contacts' or similar
Step Expected: The institution with no contacts is listed in the table with a clear indication of 'No Contacts'

Step Action: Attempt to add another institution with no contacts and verify the system handles it correctly
Step Expected: The system allows the second institution to be added without any contacts and displays a success message

Step Action: Verify the system does not throw any errors when multiple institutions with no contacts are added
Step Expected: The system does not throw any errors and all institutions with no contacts are listed correctly
